Package org.microbean.jersey.netty

Provides classes and interfaces for integrating Jersey into Netty.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AbstractByteBufBackedChannelOutboundInvokingOutputStream.ByteBufCreator
    A creator of ByteBufs that uses a byte array or a portion of a byte array as its raw materials.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractByteBufBackedChannelOutboundInvokingOutputStream<T>
    An AbstractChannelOutboundInvokingOutputStream that creates its messages from ByteBuf instances.
    AbstractChannelOutboundInvokingOutputStream<T>
    An OutputStream that delegates writing and flushing operations to a ChannelOutboundInvoker.
    AbstractContainerRequestDecoder<T,H extends T,D extends T>
    A MessageToMessageDecoder that decodes messages of a specific type into ContainerRequests.
    AbstractContainerRequestHandlingResponseWriter<T>
    An abstract ChannelInboundHandlerAdapter that is also a ContainerResponseWriter that processes incoming ContainerRequest events, such as those dispatched by an AbstractContainerRequestDecoder, by supplying them to the ApplicationHandler.handle(ContainerRequest) method.
    ByteBufBackedChannelOutboundInvokingHttp2DataFrameOutputStream
    An AbstractByteBufBackedChannelOutboundInvokingOutputStream that writes Http2DataFrame messages.
    ByteBufBackedChannelOutboundInvokingHttpContentOutputStream
    An AbstractByteBufBackedChannelOutboundInvokingOutputStream that writes HttpContent messages.
    Http2ContainerRequestHandlingResponseWriter
    An AbstractContainerRequestHandlingResponseWriter implemented in terms of Http2Headers, Http2HeadersFrames, Http2DataFrames and ByteBufBackedChannelOutboundInvokingHttp2DataFrameOutputStreams.
    Http2StreamFrameToContainerRequestDecoder
    An AbstractContainerRequestDecoder that decodes Http2StreamFrames into ContainerRequests.
    HttpContainerRequestHandlingResponseWriter
    An AbstractContainerRequestHandlingResponseWriter implemented in terms of HttpRequests, HttpResponses and ByteBufBackedChannelOutboundInvokingHttpContentOutputStreams.
    HttpObjectToContainerRequestDecoder
    An AbstractContainerRequestDecoder that decodes HttpObjects into ContainerRequests.
    JerseyChannelInitializer
    A ChannelInitializer that initializes Channels by configuring their ChannelPipelines to include ChannelHandlers that transform Netty HTTP and HTTP/2 messages into Jersey ContainerRequests that are then handled by an ApplicationHandler.
    MapBackedPropertiesDelegate
    A simple PropertiesDelegate built around a Map.
    SecurityContextAdapter
    A fallback SecurityContext implementation that provides no user Principal, has no role or user database, is not secure, and that does not require authentication.
    SimpleContainer
    A straightforward Container implementation that is not actually needed for Jersey integration.
    TerminableByteBufInputStream
    An InputStream implementation that reads from a CompositeByteBuf whose contents are updated via the addByteBuf(ByteBuf) method.

Package org.microbean.jersey.netty Description

Provides classes and interfaces for integrating Jersey into Netty.
Author:
Laird Nelson
See Also:
JerseyChannelInitializer, HttpObjectToContainerRequestDecoder, HttpContainerRequestHandlingResponseWriter, Http2StreamFrameToContainerRequestDecoder, Http2ContainerRequestHandlingResponseWriter
